api_list.name: A
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://icpc-api-test.p.rapidapi.com/icpc_query/semantic_search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "icpc-api-test.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
